issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

components.name: eucanetd
components.description: Used to track component level items associated with Edge.

fields.summary: VPC - Duplicate snat rules for instances

comments.body: addressed in master from commit friday (oct 11) morning

Launched/terminated instances for a while and then verified rules looked good:

{code}
#
# for CHAIN in $(midonet-cli -A --mido http://127.0.0.1:8080/midonet-api -e 'list chain' | awk '{print $2}'); do midonet-cli -A --mido http://127.0.0.1:8080/midonet-api -e "chain ${CHAIN} list rule"; done | grep snat
